Articles.Content: Time after time, I find myself clicking and dragging the camera view bit by bit just so I can keep the planet I am orbiting in view. I would absolutely love to see a new camera view which pins to the apsect angle to the ship and the orbited body. However you drag the camera, it will maintain the same angle with relation to the ship and the orbited body. This means the camera is constantly rotating with the position of the ship as it orbits a body, thereby keeping the body in view (if that's how you set it) at all times. The ship could spin around its own axes without affecting the camera.
